6 class AsymmetricKeyException : public LibCryptoSecException
7 {
8 public:
9  enum ErrorCode
10  {
11  UNKNOWN,
12  SET_NO_VALUE,
13  INVALID_TYPE,
14  INTERNAL_ERROR,
15  UNAVAILABLE_KEY,
16  INVALID_ASYMMETRIC_KEY,
17  };
18  AsymmetricKeyException(std::string where)
19  {
20  this->where = where;
21  this->errorCode = AsymmetricKeyException::UNKNOWN;
22  this->details = "";
23  }

31  {
32  this->where = where;
33  this->errorCode = errorCode;
34  this->details = details;
35  }
36  virtual ~AsymmetricKeyException() throw () {}
37  virtual std::string getMessage() const
38  {
39  return (AsymmetricKeyException::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode) + ". Details: " + this->details + ".");
40  }
41  virtual std::string toString() const
42  {
43  std::string ret;
44  if (this->errorCode == AsymmetricKeyException::UNKNOWN)
45  {
46  ret = "AsymmetricKeyException. Called by: " + this->where + ".";
47  }
48  else
49  {
50  ret = "AsymmetricKeyException: " + AsymmetricKeyException::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode) + ". Called by: " + this->where + ".";
51  }
52  if (this->details != "")
53  {
54  ret += " More details: " + this->details + ".";
55  }
56  return ret;
57  }
58  virtual AsymmetricKeyException::ErrorCode getErrorCode()
59  {
60  return this->errorCode;
61  }
62  static std::string errorCode2Message(AsymmetricKeyException::ErrorCode errorCode)
63  {
64  std::string ret;
65  switch (errorCode)
66  {
67  case AsymmetricKeyException::UNKNOWN:
68  ret = "Unknown error";
69  break;
70  case AsymmetricKeyException::SET_NO_VALUE:
71  ret = "Set no value";
72  break;
73  case AsymmetricKeyException::INVALID_TYPE:
74  ret = "Invalid asymmetric key type";
75  break;
76  case AsymmetricKeyException::INTERNAL_ERROR:
77  ret = "Internal error";
78  break;
79  case AsymmetricKeyException::UNAVAILABLE_KEY:
80  ret = "Asymmetric key not available";
81  break;
82  case AsymmetricKeyException::INVALID_ASYMMETRIC_KEY:
83  ret = "Invalid asymmetric key";
84  break;
85 // case AsymmetricKeyException:::
86 // ret = "";
87 // break;
88  }
89  return ret;
90  }
91 protected:
92  AsymmetricKeyException::ErrorCode errorCode;
93 };
